name: Skelittle: A Giant Party!!
description: Get together & funk-up the house with this crazy PARTY GAME! Choose your tiny mess-maker to turn your everyday environment into a huge playground. Challenge friends & family in a series of wicked LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MINIGAMES and get creative together in the SANDBOX MODE.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit or 32-bit version) Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel graphic 4440 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Gamepads recommended
